name: Name
about-us-content: We, at MastBit aim to offer a fully independent self-managed, stable, efficient, fair and transparent investment solution. MastBit uses the underlying Blockchain technology and Peer to Peer network architecture to incorporate the much desired financial security and income stability in the current unstable market scenario. MastBit offers an alternate non-government self-regulated and independent cryptocurrency investment platform ensuring the highest degree of digital data confidentiality, security, transparency and easy interface for money transfers. The money can be transferred in real time irrespective of time and place across the globe. MastBit has a clear vision and well-defined strategy to achieve the same.Our propensity to excel by providing financial freedom and stability in the current fluctuating economy helps us to stand invincible in the current scenario. Backed by distributed ledger technologies and world?s best technical team, MastBit is all set to create a benchmark in the cryptocurrency market.Be a part of our Family and unfold the opportunities for next-generation investment solutions with us!!
blockProductionContent: On the Ethereum blockchain, block production may occur at random times as timing is determined by the proof of work. Your transaction may not be included in the ethereum blockchain at the time you expect it to be. In such a case you may not receive the MastBit tokens the same day you sent the ethereum.
blockProductionMayOccurAtRandomTimes: Block Production may occur at Random Times
buySellTradeCryptoCurrencies: By subscribing our services you will be instantly notified on the most recent developments and offers circulated by MastBit.

highPerformanceDetail: MastBit proprietary order matching engine can process millions of orders with sub-millisecond latency.
losingThePrivateKey: Losing the private key / Ether wallet
losingThePrivateKeyContent: If you lose the private key or the password of the Ether wallet where you can hold your MastBit tokens, you will not have access to these MastBit tokens and may lose them forever.
networkCongestionContent: The Ethereum network is liable to face congestion at times, due to which the transactions can be delayed or even lost. Please note that this is a limitation of the ethereum blockchain and not the MastBit contract.
noAdviceP1: No information in MastBit whitepaper should be considered to be business, legal, and financial or tax advice regarding MastBit, the Distributor, the MastBit tokens, the MastBit Token Sale, the MastBit Wallet, and the MastBit Exchange (each as referred to in the Whitepaper). You should consult your own legal, financial, tax or other professional adviser regarding MastBit and/or the Distributor and their respective businesses and operations, the MastBit tokens, the MastBit Token Sale, the MastBit Wallet, and the MastBit Exchange (each as referred to in the Whitepaper). You should be aware that you may be required to bear the financial risk of any purchase of MastBit tokens for an indefinite period of time.

riskAssociatedWithOtherApplicationsConte: You understand and accept that the MastBit platform and products may give rise to other, alternative projects, promoted by unaffiliated third parties, under which MastBit will have no intrinsic value.
riskOfAbandonment: Risk of abandonment / lack of success
riskOfAbandonmentContent: You understand and accept that the creation of the MastBit tokens and the development of the MastBit platform may be abandoned for several reasons, including lack of interest from the public, lack of funding, lack of commercial success or prospects (e.g. caused by competing projects). You therefore understand that there is no assurance that, even if the MastBit platform is partially or fully developed and launched, you will receive any benefits through the MastBit tokens held by you.
riskOfEthereumMiningAttacksContent: You understand and accept that, as with other cryptocurrencies, the blockchain used for the MastBit tokens is susceptible to mining attacks, including but not limited to double?spend attacks, majority mining power attacks, 'selfish?mining' attacks, and race condition attacks.
riskOfTheftContent: You understand and accept that the underlying software application and software platform (i.e. the Ethereum blockchain) may be exposed to attacks by hackers or other individuals that that could result in theft or loss of MastBit tokens or ETH, impacting the ability to develop the MastBit platform.

sendEtherContent: The MastBit token will be sent to the same account you used to send the funds (Ether). If you send the ETH from an exchange or an account you do not control, you may not be able to claim your MastBit Tokens.
sendEtherOnlyWithAnAccountYouFullyOwn: Send Ether only with an account you fully own

MastBit token buyers should seek appropriate independent professional advice prior to relying on, or entering into any commitment or transaction based on, material published in the whitepaper, which material is purely published for reference purposes alone.
termsP4: MastBit does not provide any opinion on any advice to purchase, sell, or otherwise transact with MastBit tokens and the fact of presentation of this white paper shall not form the basis of, or be relied upon relating to, any contract or investment decision.

myAPIInfo: Manage your API keys here. We strongly recommend that you store them with care as these API keys can not be recovered. Please protect the security of your API keys and API secrets, just as you would treat your private information. If you think that one of the two has been compromised, please dismiss it as soon as possible.
